title: Aoi Shiro - Aoi Shiro no Waltz
original_name: アオイシロ －青い城の円舞曲－
sinopse: Akita Momoko who entered Seijou Girls Academy is staying in the dorms. Her roommate is Aizawa Yasumi and Momoko is drawn to her, but Yasumi is searching for a different girl. Who is that girl…and what will become of Momoko’s feelings…!?
